message.name: ERR_SENSITIVITY_HIGHER_THAN_USER
message.locale: You cannot set the sensitivity of this record to a level higher than your sensitivity.

message.name: ERR_READ_SENSITIVITY_HIGHER_THAN_USER_OR_LOWER_THAN_RELATED_CLIENT
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate security privileges to view this record.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_MODIFY_SENSITIVITY_HIGHER_THAN_USER_OR_LOWER_THAN_RELATED_CLIENT
message.locale: You cannot set the sensitivity of this record to a level higher than your sensitivity or lower than a related clients sensitivity.

message.name: ERR_SENSITIVITY_READ_ACCESS_DENIED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate security privileges to view this record.

message.name: ERR_SENSITIVITY_DELETE_ACCESS_DENIED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate security privileges to delete this record.

message.name: ERR_SENSITIVITY_MODIFY_ACCESS_DENIED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate security privileges to modify this record.

message.name: ERR_SENSITIVITY_NOT_SET
message.locale: Mandatory field 'Sensitivity' has not been set.

message.name: ERR_SENSITIVITY_ACCESS_DENIIED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to perform this action.

message.name: ERR_CONCERN_ROLE_SENSITIVITY_MEETING_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: You must update the Meeting Minutes sensitivity level before adding this attendee. A Meeting Minutes record cannot have a sensitivity level which is lower than the sensitivity level of each of its participant invitees.

message.name: ERR_ALL_PARTICIPANT_ATTENDEE_SENSITIVITY_HIGHER_MEETING_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: You cannot modify the sensitivity level of this record to be lower than all of the attendees sensitivity levels.
